metadata.synopsis: Origing Moment with Godey, lackey of Cazador.Astarion hates him.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl + Shift + 7)Astarion - Recruit - as CompanionAstarion - Teleport - KennelMove in the direction the character is facingClick on the torch that is not litEnter the roomWalk to towards the wall that is opposite the door.

2.speaker: Godey
2.text: So so, you've come home, little one. And come to visit Godey in your old kennel.

52.speaker: Astarion
52.text: It's taking everything I have not to grind your rotten carcass to dust.

25.speaker: Godey
25.text: Don't be mad at Godey, child. I only did my job. Only kept you in line.

4.speaker: Astarion
4.text: You tortured us. For days at a time.
4.context: NodeContext: Growly or through gritted teeth

17.speaker: Godey
17.text: Oh yes, and you sang so sweetly for me. None of the others screamed like you did.

32.speaker: Godey
32.text: But you're home now, and you brought me a treat, eh? A new friend for Godey?

11.speaker: Player
11.text: Cazador hired me to capture Astarion. I'm here to deliver.

50.speaker: Godey
50.text: But you're too late to see the master. The doors are sealed, he will not be disturbed.

16.speaker: Astarion
16.text: Doors can be unsealed. Just give us the key and we'll show ourselves in.

6.speaker: Godey
6.text: Godey will not open them for anyone, much less for you.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: Your master needs Astarion for the ritual. He'll be furious if you stop us joining him.

7.speaker: Godey
7.text: Godey was wondering about that... Godey knows the master was searching for Astarion. He must have forgotten Astarion was lost.

53.speaker: Godey
53.text: Take it and trouble Godey no more. Let the master know I found Astarion.

21.speaker: Godey
21.text: Now go to him. Help him achieve his destiny.

37.speaker: Godey
37.text: Here, here it - no... where is it?

29.speaker: Godey
29.text: No no, master will be furious if it is lost. Godey must find it.

28.speaker: Godey
28.text: The master will not be disobeyed! You will not open that door.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Cazador gave me orders too - Astarion needs to be returned no matter what.

13.speaker: Player
13.text: How about I start breaking bones and keep going until I find that key?

1.speaker: Godey
1.text: Wait! Godey has the key. Godey can give it to you.

0.speaker: Godey
0.text: Oh no. No no no, Godey is not worried by your threats. Godey has seen so much worse than you.

23.speaker: Astarion
23.text: Things have changed, Godey. We might surprise you.

20.speaker: Godey
20.text: I doubt it, little one. Come, let's hear you scream one last time.

5.speaker: Godey
5.text: Oh yes, fight Godey. Spill your blood on his kennel's floor.

10.speaker: Astarion
10.text: Doors can be unsealed. Do you have the key?

26.speaker: Godey
26.text: Perhaps. But the master ordered the doors closed until he was finished.

39.speaker: Godey
39.text: Lies, lies, lies! And lies must be punished.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Lay a hand on me and lose it, bones.

24.speaker: Godey
24.text: Not very nice. Not very friendly.

14.speaker: Godey
14.text: Why are you here, then, little one? If not to see Godey.

40.speaker: Astarion
40.text: We're here to see the master, but the ballroom door's locked. Give us the key.
40.context: NodeContext: reluctantly calling Cazador 'the master' to try and trick Godey into giving you the key

42.speaker: Godey
42.text: Hah! No no, it is too late. The doors are sealed on master's orders.

27.speaker: Astarion
27.text: Isn't it obvious? I'm going to kill Cazador.

8.speaker: Godey
8.text: How dare you! As if you could lay a finger on the master, you ungrateful little brat!

49.speaker: Godey
49.text: Godey will not let you get away with blasphemy. Godey will see you punished!

30.speaker: Astarion
30.text: I know you're there, Godey. Stop skulking and show yourself.

48.speaker: Godey
48.text: You always were sharp, little one. Sharp enough to cut yourself.
